summary: "Dawson's Creek" was a popular American TV show about teenage friends living in the imaginary town of Capeside. It ran from 1998 to 2003, with 128 episodes over six seasons. The main characters, played by James Van Der Beek, Katie Holmes, Joshua Jackson, and Michelle Williams, navigated high school and college life. Filmed in North Carolina, the series made its stars famous and influenced many other teen dramas. It was one of The WB network's most successful shows.
title: Dawson's Creek
